Akvo | Amsterdam, Bangalore | ONSITE

At Akvo Foundation we build open source SaaS for country governments, UN organisations, NGOs and companies, primarily used to gather and work with data to achieve the UN Sustainable Development Goals. Come work with us and make a difference in the world.

- S/W Product manager, Amsterdam

- Full-stack developer with QA experience, Bangalore

Hiring process: introduction letter and CV to work(at)akvo.org. Review of online presence (GitHub, blogs, etc). Up to three interviews total, with dev lead, some colleagues, product managers, CTO.

http://akvo.org/about-us/working-at-akvo/
